data.text: Austin NicholsNichols dated artist Claire Oswalt for seven years before breaking off their engagement in 2004.George ClooneyAfter meeting British model Lisa Snowdon on the set of a martini advertisement in 2000, he had a five-year on-again, off-again relationship with her.Adrienne MaloofOn January 22, 2013, Maloof confirmed that she was dating reality star Sean Stewart, son of British rocker Rod Stewart.Kaley CuocoShe later became engaged to addiction specialist Josh Resnik, but they broke off their engagement in March 2012.Richard PryorHe soon began dating Jennifer Lee and they married in 1981.Brendan FevolaHowever, on 12 December 2006 it was announced that they were separated after 14 months of marriage, amid allegations of Fevola's infidelity with an Australian model, rumoured to be Lara Bingle.Chely WrightIn the last months of 2000, Wright embarked on an affair with fellow country music singer Brad Paisley.Christina Milian Milian met actor Nick Cannon on the set of their film, Love Do n't Cost a Thing, in 2003, and they began dating.Anna Tsuchiya In 2004, Tsuchiya announced her engagement to model and actor Joshua Niimura, the younger brother of model Friedia Niimura (Rin Kozue).David Walliams In 2009, Walliams began dating Dutch model Lara Stone.Alexandre PatoOn July 2, 2013, after two and a half years of relationship, Pato broke up with his girlfriend, Barbara Berlusconi.Kelly OsbourneIn July 2010, she split from him after he had an affair with model Elle Schneider.Lance ArmstrongIn March 2007, Armstrong began dating designer Tory Burch.Alex Jones (presenter) Alex was in a relationship with television presenter Matt Johnson for six years until 2009, but now has a new boyfriend named Charlie.Christina ApplegateApplegate subsequently began dating Lee Grivas, whom she met through a co-star of the Broadway production of Sweet Charity ; he later died in the summer of 2008.Hyun Young Hyun Young previously dated singer Kim Jong-min of Koyote for three years ; they broke up in April 2009.Kramer (musician)In 1991 they began a romantic relationship while Kramer was separated from his estranged wife, who was at that point three months pregnant with their daughter.Jason PatricThey dated for two years, after which he dated former co-star Jennifer Jason Leigh (1993 -- 94).Lillian HellmanShe described how her relationship with Melby changed over time and how their sexual relationship was briefly renewed in 1950 after a long hiatus :'' The relationship obviously at this point was neither one thing nor the other : it was neither over nor was it not over.''Olivier MartinezMartinez began dating actress Halle Berry in 2010 after meeting on the set of their film Dark Tide.Javad Nekounam Nekounam was dating with Leyla Otadi but both of them announced that their separation in December 2009.Justin TimberlakeIn January 2007, Timberlake began dating actress Jessica Biel, with whom he had been photographed on multiple occasions ; the couple initially refrained from publicizing their relationship.Kang Hye-jung She dated Love Phobia costar Jo Seung-woo for three years ; the high-profile couple broke up in 2007.Death of Zahra BakerIn January 2011 it was reported that Elisa Baker was charged with bigamy after it was confirmed that Elisa Baker was still married to Aaron Young when she wed Adam Baker.Brody JennerIn 2007, Jenner began dating Conrad, which led to the deterioration with his friendship with Pratt.Kaylee DeFerDeFer subsequently began dating Michael Fitzpatrick, lead vocalist for the band Fitz and the Tantrums, and in May 2013, she announced that they were expecting a child together.Jensen Ackles After three years of dating, Ackles became engaged to actress, model, and gymnast Danneel Harris in November 2009.Lee Jin-wook After meeting on the set of Air City in 2007, Lee began dating actress Choi Ji-woo.Sandra Church In October 1961 it was widely reported that Church and Gypsy composer Jule Styne would marry, although this was denied in rehearsals of the musical.Harmon WagesHe developed a reputation and earned a nick name'' Charmin' Harmon'' for dating high-profile Atlanta women, including television reporter Deborah Norville ; Norville ended their five-year relationship in 1984 when he was charged with cocaine-related offenses.Mike ModanoOn November 30, 2006, singer/songwriter Willa Ford announced that Modano, her long-time boyfriend, had proposed to her during the weekend of Thanksgiving, 2006.Simone ClarkeOn 19 December 2007, it was announced she planned to marry BNP councillor Richard Barnbrook, whom she had been seeing for more than nine months.Nastassja Kinski In 1976, when Kinski was 15, she reportedly began a romantic relationship with then 43 year old director Roman Polanski.Miley CyrusDuring its production, she was involved in an on-again, off-again relationship with her co-star Liam Hemsworth ; the couple ultimately separated after ending their year-long engagement in 2013.Angellica BellBell began a relationship with her former BBC co-star Michael Underwood and they married in New York in December 2010.Wladimir KlitschkoIn October 2013, Panettiere confirmed that she and Klitschko are engaged, which had been rumoured since the summer.Megan FoxFox later denied these reports, stating that they had been continuously engaged since 2006.Marilyn MillerIn 1932, she announced her intention to marry the movie actor Don Alvarado, but the wedding did not take place.Gemma WardIn 2011, in an interview for The Sunday Telegraph, Ward confirmed that they had'' developed a relationship and we started seeing each other.''Vanessa Hudgens Hudgens began a relationship with High School Musical co-star Zac Efron in 2005.Evan Rachel WoodIn the summer of 2011, Wood was reported to have rekindled her relationship with Jamie Bell, five years after they first broke up.Lauren GoldIn 2000, the model was linked to her'' Rock DJ'' co-star Robbie Williams.Bernadette Peters Peters and Steve Martin had begun a romantic relationship in 1977 that lasted approximately four years.Elizabeth HurleyOn 30 September 2011, three months after her divorce, it was reported that Hurley and Warne were engaged and she was spotted wearing a large sapphire ring, with their engagement confirmed via Twitter shortly thereafter.Jessica ChastainShe started dating Gian Luca Passi de Preposulo, an Italian-born executive for French fashion brand Moncler in early 2013.Gavin HensonOn 31 May 2010 Henson and Church announced that their relationship was over, only two months after they had announced their engagement.Pete DohertyDoherty planned to marry Moss during the summer 2007.Jenna FischerIn the summer of 2009, People magazine reported her engagement to screenwriter Lee Kirk.Piper Perabo Perabo is close friends with actress Lena Headey, and has been since they starred together in two films in 2005, The Cave and Imagine Me & You.Jordi VilasusoIn 2010, Vilasuso began dating actress Kaitlin Riley.Nikki GrahameGrahame began dating Guy Mesigan, a part-time model and carpenter, at the end of 2006.Mar?a Del CerroDel Cerro dated popular Argentine actor and singer BenjamÃ­n Rojas for four years, announcing the split in 2010.Jesse James (customizer)In late 2012, James became engaged to professional drag racer Alexis DeJoria.Andrew NeilWhile at The Sunday Times in 1988, Neil met the former Miss India, Pamella Bordes, in a nightclub.Kate BosworthShe then began a two-year relationship with her Swedish co-star of Straw Dogs, actor Alexander SkarsgÃ¥rd, which ended in July 2011.Georgia MoffettIn January 2011, several newspapers in Britain reported that Moffett was engaged to actor David Tennant.Sally Pressman On October 19, 2010, Pressman accepted the marriage proposal of her longtime boyfriend David Clayton Rogers.Brad PaisleyPaisley and Kimberly Williams began dating in 2001.Vimbai Mutinhiri Sometime in 2012, Vimbai was involved in a controversy with two other Nigerian BBA Amplified housemates, Vina and Karen (the eventual winner) over the shoot for the cover of an Abuja-based magazine, Miss Dee.Foxy Brown (rapper)In June 2008, rumors that Brown was engaged to rapper Rick Ross began to circulate after Brown and Ross were together on a cover photo of Hip Hop Weekly magazine.Kristen Bell In 2007, Bell ended a five-year relationship with former fiancÃ© Kevin Mann.Vincent LecavalierLecavalier began dating Caroline Portelance in 2001.Adam Scott (golfer)During an interview after he won the Masters in 2013, Scott revealed he is dating Marie Kojzar, a Swedish architect.Amber MarianoShe began a relationship with fellow reality star Rob'' Boston Rob'' Mariano in 2003, when they formed an alliance as castmates on Survivor : All-Stars.Kat Von DIn September 2012, Von D began dating Canadian music producer Joel Zimmerman, known professionally as Deadmau5, and gave him a star tattoo below his eye to match her own.Olivia CulpoAs of August 2013 she's dating Nick Jonas whom she met at the 2013 Miss USA competition ; he confirmed their relationship during an interview with Joan Rivers.Tom BallardThey later separated in June 2010 after 16 months of dating, with Ballard posting on his Facebook fanpage :'' Josh and I are n't going out anymore.Giorgia (singer)In the winter of 2009, Giorgia confirmed rumors that she and her fiance, singer/songwriter and dancer Emanuel Lo, were expecting their first child.Phil PerryIn 1985 he married singer Lillian'' Tang'' Tynes, and began a marriage partnership that has lasted ever since.DeAnna PappasDuring her engagement, in 2009, Pappas became the co-host of Get Married on Lifetime TV, reporting on wedding planning.Brad PittOn January 11, 2006, Jolie confirmed to People that she was pregnant with Pitt's child, thereby publicly acknowledging their relationship for the first time.Ian McShane In 1977, McShane began a five-year relationship with actress Sylvia Kristel after meeting her on the set of The Fifth Musketeer.Pete DohertyIn 2005, Doherty became prominent in tabloids, the news media, and pop culture blogs because of his romantic relationship with model Kate Moss and his frequently-publicised drug addictions.Jeff BrazierBrazier began dating former glamour model, Nicola Tappenden in December 2011.Sue BarkerIn 1986, after Barker's romance with Richard had ended and she began a brief relationship with tennis player Stephen Shaw, Richard said he was still a friend of Barker.Jesse JaneOn October 15, 2012 she announced her engagement to her personal trainer Michael Giovanni, again on Twitter.Shama SikanderIn mid-2011 speculation began regarding Sikander's relationship with India-based American actor / musician Alexx O'Nell The two were spotted with increasing frequency throughout 2011 and Sikander confirmed that they were indeed in a relationship in an interview which featured on the cover of Showtime Magazine's December 2011 issue, entitled `` Shama Sikander Finally Breaks Her Silence On Her Relationship With Alexx O'Nell''.Vanessa HudgensHudgens then briefly dated her Journey 2, co-star Josh Hutcherson in early 2011, but the two are now'' good friends''.Kate Thornton Kate began dating DJ Darren Emerson in 2004.Dave RubinAfter nine years working as a comedian, Rubin publicly came out as gay in 2006.Chad Kroeger Kroeger started dating fellow Canadian rocker Avril Lavigne on July 1, 2012.Rachel RoyIn 2011, there was speculation that she and Dwight Freeney were dating.Ryan ReynoldsSoon after the end of his relationship with Morissette in 2007, Reynolds began dating American actress Scarlett Johansson.Tatiana Santo Domingo In July 2012, Princess Caroline released a statement announcing that Andrea Casiraghi and Tatiana Santo Domingo became engaged after a seven -- year relationship.Chanel ImanShe has been dating rapper ASAP Rocky since the beginning of 2013.Chris Klein (actor) In January 2000, Klein and actress Katie Holmes began dating.Justin BieberIn early November 2012, it was reported that Bieber and Gomez had ended their relationship after approximately two years of dating.Miranda OttoIn 1997, Otto began dating her Doing Time for Patsy Cline co-star Richard Roxburgh.Kristin RossumWhile married, she had an affair with her boss, Michael Robertson, beginning in mid 2000.Rob KardashianAfter months of speculation in October 2012, Kardashian confirmed through his Twitter account that he and Rita Ora were dating.Spike JonzeIn 2011, it was reported that he was dating Japanese actress Rinko Kikuchi.Halle BerryBerry began dating French Canadian model Gabriel Aubry in November 2005.Tom Williams (presenter) In February 2012, Williams announced his engagement to fashion designer Rachel Gilbert.Priscilla ChanAfter Au, Chan dated a fashion designer Michael Cheung, and that relationship ended in 2001.Amy Winehouse Winehouse dated chef-musician Alex Clare (sometimes referred to as Alex Claire) in 2006, while on a break with her on-off boyfriend and future husband, Blake Fielder-Civil.
